cards.name: Stormlord
cards.text: Renown. Forced Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, if you control no King characters, sacrifice a character.
cards.flavor: “Most of the lords who rode with Lord Renly to Storm's End have gone over banner-and-blade to Stannis, with all their chivalry.” - Varys

cards.name: Narrow Sea Dromond
cards.text: Shadow (1). Narrow Sea Dromond contributes 1 STR to your total for dominance. Reaction: After Narrow Sea Dromond comes out of shadows, choose and kneel a character with printed cost 4 or lower.

cards.name: Wandering Disciple
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Wandering Disciple comes out of shadows, put a non-unique Drowned God character into play from your dead pile. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, discard it from play.

cards.name: Taking the Shield Islands
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Raider character, look at the losing opponent's hand. Then, choose 1 card in that hand and place it on top of its owner's deck. (Choose up to 2 cards and place them in any order instead if you played this event from shadows.) (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Crawn Son of Calor
cards.text:
Shadow (4). Stealth.
You may marshal Crawn Son of Calor into shadows from your discard pile as if he were in your hand.
cards.flavor: Tyrion was not amused. Crawn would be even less so; his Moon Brothers had the guard today.

cards.name: The Regent's Council
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which you control a participating Small Council character or Cersei Lannister, determine dominance. (Max 1 per phase.)
cards.flavor: Cersei had uprooted every rose, and all those beholden to her uncle and her brothers. In their places were men whose loyalty would be to her.

cards.name: Ser Gulian Qorgyle
cards.text: Reaction: After a character an opponent controls is declared as an attacker or defender, it loses a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase. (Limit twice per phase.)
cards.flavor: "They're scorpions, ser. House Qorgyle of Sandstone, three scorpions black on red." <cite>Podrick Payne</cite>

cards.name: Retribution
cards.text: Reaction: After a character you control is killed for [military] claim, if you control fewer characters than the attacking player, that player must choose and kill an attacking character.
cards.flavor: "Only royal blood can wash out my father's murder." <cite>Nymeria Sand</cite>

cards.name: Northern Envoy
cards.text: Reaction: After Northern Envoy enters play, reveal the top 10 cards of an opponent's deck. Choose 1 non-unique character revealed this way and place it in that player's discard pile. Shuffle that player's deck.

cards.name: Grey Galley
cards.text:
Shadow (1).
Grey Galley contributes 1 STR to your side during any challenge in which you control a defending character. (3 STR instead if Grey Galley came out of shadows this phase.)

cards.name: Steelshanks Walton
cards.text: Dominance Action: Choose a non-loyal character you own and take control of it. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: "Steelshanks, he is called. A soldier of iron loyalty." <cite>Roose Bolton</cite>

cards.name: Dubious Loyalties
cards.text: Non-loyal character you own only. Attached character gains the House Bolton trait, stealth, and renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, discard the top card of your deck to take control of attached character. (Any player may initiate this ability.)

cards.name: Magister Illyrio
cards.text: Insight. Shadow (5). Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, gain 1 gold for every 2 cards in shadows. +1 Income.

cards.name: Take to the Sky!
cards.text: Play only if you control a Dragon character. Interrupt: When a Dragon or Stormborn character would be killed or discarded from play, save it and return it to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: She had the whip in her hand and she was shouting, then she was on the dragon's back, flying.

cards.name: Butterbumps
cards.text: Shadow (2). Challenges Action: During a challenge in which Butterbumps is participating, return him to shadows to choose a participating character with a higher STR than his. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.

cards.name: The Whispering Sound
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After a location enters play during the challenges phase, kneel The Whispering Sound to draw 2 cards. Then, choose a card in your hand and place it on top of your deck.

cards.name: Lysa Arryn
cards.text: Each House Arryn character you control is considered to be loyal. While your initiative value is 0, Lysa Arryn gains the keywords of each other loyal character you control.
cards.flavor: "The Lannisters are all liars. No one will hurt my sweet boy."

cards.name: The Warden of the East
cards.text: House Arryn character only. Attached character gets +2 STR and gains the Commander trait. Reaction: After 1 or more characters are revealed from an opponent's hand, deck, or shadows area, attached character gains 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)

cards.name: Battle Beneath the Wall
cards.text: When Revealed: Name a challenge type. Until you reveal a new plot card, each player must declare all eligible characters as attackers or defenders during challenges of that type.

cards.name: Strained Reserves
cards.text: Each player cannot marshal or put into play more than 2 characters, locations, or attachments this round. (4 characters, locations, or attachments instead if that player has a Summer plot card revealed.)
